Flying
When Chef of the Rest enters, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Exile target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control. Activate only once each turn and only as a sorcery.
